Lab.Description: In this hands-on lab, you will start with the ASP.NET MVC 4 "Internet Application" project template to create a Photo Gallery application. You will progressively enhance the app using jQuery Mobile and ASP.NET MVC 4's new features to make it compatible with different mobile devices and desktop web browsers. You will also learn about new code recipes for code generation and how ASP.NET MVC 4 makes it easier for you to write asynchronous action methods by supporting ActionResult return types.
Lab.Title: What's New in ASP.NET MVC 4
